King Skabb’s rusty iron crown shattered when he fell, so you take the
from around his neck. Note it on your Adventure Sheet. You also find a chest in the corner of the room but it is clearly booby-trapped. You can open it using magic, or your skills as a thief. To pick the lock,
make a THIEVERY roll at Difficulty 9
. To use sorcery,
make a MAGIC roll at Difficulty 9
